publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2785# Elaine Smith: World Day for Water - 22 March 2002—That the Parliament notes the resolution A/RES/47/193 adopted by the United Nations General Assembly on 22 December 1992, which declared 22 March of each year as World Day for Water; further notes that this year the highly pertinent theme is "Water and Health"; expresses concern that many of our children do not have access to free drinking water whilst at school; commends North Lanarkshire Council and the South Coatbridge Social Inclusion Partnership for initiating pilot schemes in four Coatbridge primary schools to supply free, accessible drinking water to pupils, and considers that the Scottish Executive should recognise and promote the importance for our children’s health and well-being of providing free, accessible drinking water in all schools. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-2785# World Day for Water - 22 March 2002 (lodged on 26 February 2002) Alex Neil*
